member.name: M:RiptideNetworking.Client.Connect(System.String,System.Byte)
member.summary: Attempts connect to the given host address.
member.param: The host address to connect to.
The ID of the group of message handler methods to use when building .
member.remarks:
Riptide's default transport expects the host address to consist of an IP and port, separated by a colon. For example: 127.0.0.1:7777.
If you are using a different transport, check the relevant documentation for what information it requires in the host address.

member.summary: Initiates handling of currently queued messages.
member.remarks: This should generally be called from within a regularly executed update loop (like FixedUpdate in Unity). Messages will continue to be received in between calls, but won't be handled fully until this method is executed.
